ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF ( NOT(ISBLANK( Employer_Identification_Number_EIN__c )), OR(LEN( Employer_Identification_Number_EIN__c ) <>9, NOT( ISNUMBER( Employer_Identification_Number_EIN__c ))), false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: EIN must be nine digits in XXXXXXXXX format without hyphen or space.
